name: The Frogician
description:
Join the Frogician as they set out on a quest to find three Elder magicians lost somewhere within a mysterious temple.
On the journey our brave frog will encounter both curious temple visitors and dangerous foes, gaining powerful magic abilities along the way.

Average playtime: 20-30 minutes
Keyboard and gamepad supported

STORY, ART & GAME DESIGN 
August Florén
https://augomaton.itch.io/
https://augustfloren.myportfolio.com/
